article_title: France Conducts Airstrikes Against Islamic State in Syria
article_text:
PARIS—France has conducted its first airstrikes against Islamic State positions in Syria, French President François Hollande’s office said Sunday, shedding its reluctance to take overt action in the Syrian conflict as it seeks to target the militant group’s stronghold.

The airstrikes followed two weeks of reconnaissance flights to identify potential targets and were coordinated with the U.S.-led coalition that has been targeting...
